MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G21 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:45am to carry out safe digging and repairs on the underground cable fault on Campsie Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:34am on 27th December
